title: *PATREON PREVIEW* Chauncey Bills Up
description:
The entirety of The Core 4 is officially on the wrong side of 25 so now is as good of a time as ever to have a frank conversation about getting our lives back on track. As always, The Only Podcast That Matters™ is ready and willing to have the hard conversations with ourselves and ask the big questions. Like, Did Chef’s humble birthday darty ruin a poor Karen’s Sunday in the park? Has James completely wasted the last decade of his life? Why does Lawrence eat the early bird special like an old ass bitch? Is Chuck really ready to be a cat daddy? The answers to these and all of life’s most puzzling riddles are available for our incredibly successful, yet eternally humble best friends right behind the paywall.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
